thread.title: Here's the Secret to Propel Your Goals Forward
thread.title_full: Here's the Secret to Propel Your Goals Forward

author: Andrea Huspeni
title: Here's the Secret to Propel Your Goals Forward
text:
The Goal Standard Challenge Here's the Secret to Propel Your Goals Forward In a Facebook Live, productivity expert Chris Winfield shares a super simple, yet powerful trick to help you push your goals to new heights.   
When it comes to propelling your goals and daily routine forward, producting expert Chris Winfield shares a secret on how to achieve more. 
In a Facebook Live for The Goal Standard Challenge , Winfield discusses how a powerful, yet simple trick can push your goals to new heights. 
Winfield explains that you should figure out what helps move you towards your goal and do more of that. It is easy but powerful. 
Check out his Facebook Live video to get more insight, including the huge benefits of routines, the importance of structure and his daily quadrant focus. 
Related: 11 Habits of Truly Happy People 
If you havenâ€™t signed up for The Goal Standard Challenge, go to our content hub. Also, if you are late to the challenge, no worries. The hub has all the past weeks' information, content, videos and resources. 
Join our Facebook Group to get updates, real-time support and be part of a community full of achievers, just like you. Andrea Huspeni
